author: Sabrina Barr, Sabrina Barr
title: Cambridge University suggests one-way public spaces and using tongs while shopping when easing lockdown
description: 'All activities will need to be considered individually, and phased back in carefully, depending on the risk they pose to spreading the virus,' university professor says
content:
Normalising walking clockwise in public spaces and using tongs when shopping could help reduce spread of the coronavirus when easing lockdown measures, a study has claimed.
When the UK was placed in lockdown on Monday 23 March, the government said it would c… [+8513 chars]
